set (KMC_EXTERNAL_INCLUDES
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bzlib.h
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bzlib_private.h
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/zconf.h
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/zlib.h)

if (WIN32 OR APPLE)
	set (KMC_EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES
		${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libz.1.2.5.dylib
		${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libbz2.1.0.5.dylib)

	if (${KMC_BUILD_WITH_ASM})
		list (APPEND KMC_EXTERNAL_INCLUDES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/asmlib.h)
		list (APPEND KMC_EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libamac64.a)
	endif(${KMC_BUILD_WITH_ASM})

else (WIN32 OR APPLE)
	set (KMC_EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES
		${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libz.a
		${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libbz2.a)

	if (${KMC_BUILD_WITH_ASM})
		list (APPEND KMC_EXTERNAL_INCLUDES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/asmlib.h)
		list (APPEND KMC_EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/alibelf64.a)
	endif (${KMC_BUILD_WITH_ASM})

endif (WIN32 OR APPLE)

set (KMC_EXTERNAL_INCLUDES ${KMC_EXTERNAL_INCLUDES} PARENT_SCOPE)
set (KMC_EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES ${KMC_EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES} PARENT_SCOPE)
